Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lelion Way, along the north side of the Mage Emporium.
Room.LongDescription: Danielle's Mystic Mage Emporium is one of the only places in town where you can find many special magical items and other nifty potions and scrolls that are otherwise very difficult to find. The entrance to Danielle's Emporium is located on the west side of the shop along Necropolis Avenue.
